Program_Policies: The minor consists of 18 credits, at least 6 of which must be at the 400 level.; 2 credits of engineering design are included.; A grade of C or better is required for all courses in the minor, as specified by Senate Policy 59-10. In addition, at least six credits of the minor must be unique from the prescribed courses required by a student's major(s).
